Entries.Saloon: I come here on Fridays, because it's probably the most exciting thing in this town.$s
Entries.Saloon2: Zuzu city used to have dozens of places like this.$u
Entries.Saloon4: Fancy seeing you here, farmer boy.^Fancy seeing you here, farmer girl.$n
Entries.Saloon6: I love that almost everyone in town is here on Friday.  It's a lot of fun!$h
Entries.Saloon8: I'm starting to think that you might come on Fridays to see someone here...$l
Entries.Saloon10: I think we should dance tonight$h#$b#@, will you dance with me?$l
